name: The Starlight Motel
description:
TURN SOUND ON

Based loosely on the subject matter and characters in the following article:

https://www.aljazeera.com/features/2016/7/30/americas-hidden-homeless-life-in-th...

Be sure to check every table, every TV set, every sign, and talk to every character to to live out the full stories of just another day for the inhabitants of The Starlight Motel. With the game still being "in-development", each room is sure to become more descriptive and the landscape around the motel will become more expansive: exposing your avatar to new characters and new experiences. I had a blast creating the art and sequence for this game, so I hope you enjoy yourself! If you have any questions, please leave them in the comments below:
